Message:
I can’t even wrap my
head around the pain.
The only word I keep
asking myself is, “Why?”

One of those innocent
smiles answered me.

“If someone eats
a witch’s heart,
they’ll get that
witch’s power, right?

So if I do that, the next
leader will be me.”

...You’re kidding me, right?
You actually believed
that rumor?

That’s the reason you’re
going to kill me?

I devoted myself
to my father,
only to be sold off...
Now, the friends
I devoted myself to
are going to eat me!
Hahaha!

Ah-haha... You’re right.
How could I’ve been
so wrong?

In the end, we’re all filthy
beasts greedy for garbage.

It’s only fitting that we
feed on each other, right?

I pull the blade
out of my back,
and point it towards
my frightened friends.

After whispering,
“This is so I can live,”
my face twists into a smile.
